short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take your ChatGPT experience one step further

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In NextGPT, we're improving your ChatGPT experience by introducing key features like search, one-click sharing and seamless integration — all without altering the familiar interface. Everything you need is brought together in a user-friendly design to streamline your workflow.

>> Key Features <<
1- Instant Search Across Conversations – Quickly find what you need in seconds.
2- One-Click Sharing – Easily share formatted conversations with just a click.
3- Offline Privacy – All data is stored locally in your browser; we only use a lightweight backend for 4- generating PDFs when requested.
5- Flexible Export Options – Export conversations in multiple formats, including PDF, Markdown, and JSON.
6- Enhanced User Interface – Seamlessly integrates into ChatGPT without disrupting its layout or functionality.

>> What’s Next? <<

We’re constantly evolving to improve your experience. Here's a glimpse of what’s coming:
I) Advanced Conversation Management – Organize chats into folders (coming soon with improvements).
II) Long Text Handling – Automate breaking down lengthy texts into manageable chunks.
III) Microsoft Office Integration – Export directly to Google Docs for easy editing and collaboration.

>> Got a feature idea? Share it with us! We’d love to explore how we can make it a reality. <<

Stay tuned for more updates as we continue refining NextGPT!
